transArray.content: The room is clean and tidy, the check-in procedure is quick and convenient, and the service staff is warm and generous

Dear guests, hello! Thank you very much for your praise and encouragement despite your busy schedule. It is our honor to provide you with warm, considerate and high-quality services. To be recognized by you, our hearts feel sweeter than honey! Every requirement of our guests is what we sincerely strive for, and we will definitely work harder! Your satisfaction is the driving force for our progress. As a mid-range brand under Huazhu Club, Orange Hotel has always adhered to the business philosophy of delivering products and services with reliable quality, cleanliness and safety first, and strives to provide guests with near-perfect service. For check-in experience, the hotel is equipped with robots and Mr. Hua’s self-service check-in and check-out, allowing you to experience contactless, high-tech services. The buffet restaurant on the second floor has launched the Orange brand’s signature freshly baked croissants, egg tarts, and purified water boiled We also have homemade white porridge, as well as freshly cooked wontons and noodles. You are welcome to check in and taste it. We sincerely look forward to your next visit! I wish you a happy life! Manager: Zhang Lijuan
